Plot: The Parkers, a reclusive family who follow ancient customs, find their secret existence threatened as a torrential downpour moves into their area, forcing daughters Iris and Rose to assume responsibilities beyond those of a typical family.
Title: We Are What We Are
Writer: Nick Damici, Jim Mickle, Jorge Michel Grau (screenplay)
Actors: Kassie Wesley DePaiva, Laurent Rejto, Julia Garner, Ambyr Childers
tomatoConsensus: A compelling story cleverly told, We Are What We Are quenches horror buffs' thirst for gore while serving up serious-minded filmmaking and solid acting.
